IMPORT THE FILTERED DATA AS A DATAFRAME AND TAKE THE TRANSPOSE

```{r}
data <- read.csv("../../active_files/allgood_filt_agg_tidy_2021aligned_qc_rma_expression_full.csv", header = TRUE, row.names = 1)

nn <- 3

data_knn <- knnmi.all(data, k=nn)
```

BUILD THE NETWORK

```{r}
clr_network <- clr(data_knn)
```

```{r}
write.csv(as.data.frame(clr_network), file = paste('./microarray_clr_networks/clr_network_for_distances_', nn, '.csv', sep = ''), row.names = TRUE)
```
